document.heading: Society of the Cincinnati Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-170, the “Society of the Cincinnati Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-545, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 2, 1998, and June 16, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 8, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-413 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-170 became effective on October 16, 1998.
